description: The Serial Serial is a podcast about a podcast. Every week, a few Onion Inc. staffers will be talking about an episode of Serial's hit spinoff, S-Town, another of the most popular and addictive podcasts on iTunes.
title: The Serial Serial

episodes.title: Episode 7: Each Wounds, the Last Kills
episodes.description:
The Serial Serial crew wraps up its look at S-Town with talk about tattoos, time, and mercury poisoning.

episodes.title: Episode 6:  Did John B. McLemore know love?
episodes.description:
This week, we're diving slowly and sensuously into the sixth episode of S-Town. We talk about our love for Olan, the lasting legacy of Brokeback Mountain, and the futility of being gay in a small town.

episodes.title: Episode 5: Big Gold Nipple Rings
episodes.description:
This week, the Serial Serial crew tackles the fifth episode of S-Town, in which Tyler faces down felony charges, Reta gets a soapbox, and we get to know a guy named Michael Fuller.

episodes.title: Episode 4: Why didn't John make a Will?
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Episode 3: R.I.P. John B. McLemore
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Season 2, episodes 7 and 8: Is Bowe sick, or just weird?
episodes.description:
This week, we're talking Serial's surprise two-parter from last week, "Hindsight" parts one and two. Josh, Marah, and Laura pick about Bowe Bergdahl's motives, talk DSM-5, and then work on faking our own deaths.
